name: sv-reading-view
description: Build system for SV Reading View UserScript

scripts.watch: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { exec } = require('child_process'); console.log('Watching src/ for changes...'); fs.watch('src', { recursive: true }, () => { console.log('Change detected, rebuilding...'); exec('npm run build', (err, stdout) => { if (err) console.error(err); else console.log(stdout); }); });"

author: Stefan van Oudenaarden
